qe_common module¶

Common PathFinder (QED) and PFE helper functions.

class qe_common.C[source]¶

Bases: object

Stub replacement for missing classes.

qe_common.baseName(name)[source]¶

Return base name of entity for test name ID.

qe_common.check(cmd, quiet=False)[source]¶

Log and report exceptions in single swagger call test functions.

Args:
cmd (str) - the swagger client command to be executed, without the .result()
Kwargs:
quiet (bool) - Default False, so errors are logged on ‘error’ level.
When True, errors will be reported on debug level, so to suppress unnecessary logs for expected error cases.
Returns:
Returns the cmd result - cmd.result()
Raises:
Re-raises any underlying swagger client exception.

qe_common.retry_check(*args, **kw)[source]¶

Log and report exceptions in single swagger call test functions.

cmd - the swagger client command to be executed, without the .result() resultAttribute - attribute in the result to compare to the expected result expectedResult - expected return from cmd.result()
